body: Fixes #621 --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/920)

comments.author: palladia
comments.body: You mentioned disabled tests for Windows, but I couldn't find them.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
@palladia I added tests that pass on Linux and ensure the contents are enumerable. There is a bug that needs to be fixed, see #962.

I am unsure if they will pass on Windows, but they should. That bug also needs to be fixed so that Windows can `ls symlinktodir` correctly.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
I'm not sure how we would go about testing `Remove-Item` of symbolic links. It's implicitly tested with the `CleanState` hook.

Perhaps we should test, explicitly not Windows, that we can `ri` a symlink to a directory without `-Force` or `-Recurse`.

title: Fixes removal of symbolic link on Windows, and don't ask confirmation on Linux
